feature_model.name: Web_Portal

meta.data: This feature model describes the configurations of an emergency response system
200 University Ave. West, Waterloo, ON, Canada
Naeem Esfahani, Sam Malek, Kaveh Razavi. GuideArch: Guiding the exploration of architectural solution space under uncertainty

feature_model.feature_tree: :r searchandrescuefm(searchandrescuefm) :m locationfinding(locationfinding) :g (_id_0) [1,1] : gps(gps) : radiotriangulation(radiotriangulation) :m hardwareplatform(hardwareplatform) :g (_id_1) [1,1] : nexusonehtc(nexusonehtc) : droidmotoroal(droidmotoroal) :m filesharing(filesharing) :g (_id_2) [1,1] : filemanageropentintents(filemanageropentintents) : inhousefilemanager(inhousefilemanager) :m reportsynchronization(reportsynchronization) :g (_id_3) [1,1] : explicitreportssync(explicitreportssync) : implicitreportssync(implicitreportssync) :m chatprotocol(chatprotocol) :g (_id_4) [1,1] : openfire(openfire) : inhousechatprotocol(inhousechatprotocol) :m mapaccess(mapaccess) :g (_id_5) [1,1] : ondemandgooglesite(ondemandgooglesite) : cachedgoogleserver(cachedgoogleserver) : preloadedesri(preloadedesri) :m connectivity(connectivity) :g (_id_6) [1,1] : wifi(wifi) : threegnexusone(threegnexusone) : threedroid(threedroid) : bluetooth(bluetooth) :m database(database) :g (_id_7) [1,1] : mysql(mysql) : sqlite(sqlite) :m architecturalstyle(architecturalstyle) :g (_id_8) [1,1] : peertopeer(peertopeer) : clientserver(clientserver) : pushbased(pushbased) :m dataexchangeformat(dataexchangeformat) :g (_id_9) [1,1] : xml(xml) : compressedxml(compressedxml) : unformatteddata(unformatteddata)
